image_analysis.description: A composite image showing four pages of a legal deposition transcript, arranged in a 2x2 grid. The pages are numbered 61, 62, 63, and 64. The text is formatted with timestamps, line numbers, and speaker attributions, typical of a court reporter's transcript.
image_analysis.layout: The image is divided into four quadrants, each displaying a full page of the transcript. Page 61 is top-left, 62 is bottom-left, 63 is top-right, and 64 is bottom-right. Each page has a header with the page number and a footer with metadata.

document_metadata.subject: Questioning of Professor Cassell regarding the factual basis for an allegation that Dershowitz abused other minors, and the assertion of attorney-client privilege.

notes: The document is a composite of four pages from a larger deposition transcript. The speakers are identified by their roles (Q, A, THE WITNESS) or names (MR. SIMPSON, MR. SCAROLA, MS. MCCAWLEY).
